Major_Arcs.title: King Guz's Predicament and the Clam Debt
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces King Guz in a dangerous situation and quickly transitions to a humorous conflict about an unpaid debt, revealing a transactional aspect to the 'rescue'.

sub_scenes.title: Drowning King and Dubious Rescue
sub_scenes.description: King Guz is drowning and calling for help. Alley and another character witness this and the other character promises to rescue him.

sub_scenes.title: The Clam Debt Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Immediately after the 'rescue', the rescuer confronts King Guz about a debt, revealing the possible ulterior motive behind the rescue.

narrative_arcs.title: The Debt of Clams and the 'Rescue'

Major_Arcs.title: Bronto's Clumsiness and the Dinosaur Dealership
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Alley Oop's frustration with Bronto's clumsiness, leading to the idea of getting a new dinosaur and exploring a dinosaur dealership.

sub_scenes.title: Bronto's Tree Accident
sub_scenes.description: Bronto bumps into a tree, causing Alley to encounter an angry tree-dwelling dinosaur.

narrative_arcs.title: Bronto's Bumpy Ride and the Tree Dweller

sub_scenes.title: Diagnosing Bronto's Problem
sub_scenes.description: Alley complains about Bronto's clumsiness to another caveman, who suggests it's due to old age.

sub_scenes.title: Considering a Trade-In and Visiting Dealership
sub_scenes.description: The idea of trading in Bronto is introduced, leading to a visit to Honest Zog's Dinosaur Dealership.

narrative_arcs.title: The Little Baby with Zip and Power

Major_Arcs.title: Buying a Biting Dinosaur and Farewell to Bronto
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc covers the test drive of a new dinosaur, its aggressive behavior, the surprising purchase despite this, and the emotional farewell to Bronto.

sub_scenes.title: Test Drive Mishaps
sub_scenes.description: The test drive starts positively but quickly turns dangerous when the dinosaur attempts to bite the caveman.

narrative_arcs.title: Initial Impression of the New Dinosaur

sub_scenes.title: Purchase and Regret
sub_scenes.description: Despite the biting incident, the caveman buys the dinosaur, but immediately feels regret about trading in Bronto.

Major_Arcs.title: Dinny's Deceptive Sale and Reunion
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the caveman's attempt to buy a cheap dinosaur, unknowingly buying back his old dinosaur Dinny, and their eventual reunion after Dinny is mistreated.

sub_scenes.title: Buying a Cheap Dinosaur - Unknowingly Dinny
sub_scenes.description: The caveman buys a cheap dinosaur from Honest Zog, lured by the low price and gentle history.

narrative_arcs.title: Closing the Deal with a Sales Pitch
Voice from the Past: Dinny's Roar

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Rescue and Reunion
sub_scenes.description: Dinny is mistreated, prompting intervention and leading to the caveman realizing he bought back Dinny, ensuring they stay together.

Major_Arcs.title: Alley and Coola's Breakup over Fishing
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts a relationship breakup triggered by a fishing invitation and escalating into accusations and a symbolic end.

sub_scenes.title: Fishing Invitation and Rejection
sub_scenes.description: Alley invites Coola fishing, but she rejects him, leading to an argument.

sub_scenes.title: Misogynistic Fishing Complaints
sub_scenes.description: Following the breakup, cavemen express misogynistic views and fishing-related frustrations.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation and Apology by the River

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Rivalry and Misdirected Violence
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts a love triangle, fueled by rumors and escalating into violence based on misunderstanding, ultimately revealing the woman's true affections.

sub_scenes.title: Rumors of Romantic Competition
sub_scenes.description: Rumors of romantic competition for Oola arise, initially dismissed but then investigated.

sub_scenes.title: Violent Jealousy and Clarification
sub_scenes.description: Jealousy leads to violence, but the woman clarifies her affections, revealing the attacker's misjudgment.

narrative_arcs.title: Realization of Error and Rejected Suitor

Major_Arcs.title: Learning Romance and the Crocodile Mishap
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the rejected caveman seeking romantic advice and then attempting romantic gestures, leading to a humorous crocodile incident.

sub_scenes.title: Seeking Romantic Advice
sub_scenes.description: The rejected caveman seeks advice on romance, learning about 'tender' approaches.

narrative_arcs.title: Seeking Advice on Romance and Rivalry

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Gestures and Crocodile Comedy
sub_scenes.description: Romantic rivalry escalates with flower and branch offerings, culminating in a crocodile getting stuck in a hut.

narrative_arcs.title: The Branch Offering and Impending Danger

Major_Arcs.title: Jealousy, Misinterpreted Kiss, and Infidelity Punishment
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc features escalating jealousy, a violent confrontation based on misunderstanding a kiss, and a separate scenario of public punishment for infidelity.

sub_scenes.title: Jealous Eavesdropping and Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Jealous caveman observes Koko and Oola, leading to a violent confrontation based on misinterpreting a kiss.

sub_scenes.title: Punishment for Infidelity and Romantic Rebrand
sub_scenes.description: Separate scenes depict public shaming for infidelity and a man's attempt to become 'romantic'.

narrative_arcs.title: Accusations of Infidelity and Physical Retribution
Plea for Forgiveness and Romantic Rebrand

Major_Arcs.title: The Dangerous New Twist Dance Craze
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new dance craze, highlights its dangerous nature and social pressures, and depicts a disastrous dance lesson.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction and Social Pressure of 'The Twist'
sub_scenes.description: The 'New Twist' dance is introduced as dangerous and socially demanding.

narrative_arcs.title: The Dangerous New Twist Dance and Initial Resistance
Social Pressure and Demands to Learn the New Twist

sub_scenes.title: Disastrous Dance Lesson
sub_scenes.description: A dance lesson for 'The Twitch' goes horribly wrong, with painful foot-stepping.

narrative_arcs.title: A Disastrous First Dance Lesson and Name Reveal

Major_Arcs.title: Consequences of 'The Twitch' and Time Travel Plan
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the chaotic and harmful consequences of 'The Twitch' dance and transitions to a plan to use time travel for historical research.

sub_scenes.title: Chaos and Hospitalization from 'The Twitch'
sub_scenes.description: The 'New Twist' dance causes widespread chaos, humiliation, and hospitalization.

narrative_arcs.title: Reflecting on 'The Twitch' and its Unforeseen Consequences

sub_scenes.title: Planning Time Travel for Research
sub_scenes.description: A plan is made to use time travel to get firsthand information about 16th-century Spain.

Major_Arcs.title: Time Travel Mishap and Accidental Trip to the Future
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details a time travel attempt that goes awry, sending the characters to the future instead of their intended destination.

sub_scenes.title: Interrupted Kiss and Time Machine Activation
sub_scenes.description: A romantic moment is interrupted by the activation of the time machine.

narrative_arcs.title: Reluctant Kiss and Time Machine Activation
Unexpected Time Travel to the Future
Arrival in the Twentieth Century and Return to Spain

Major_Arcs.title: Spanish Serenade, Bullfight, and Unintentional Heroism
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows a time-traveler's arrival in Spain, his misunderstanding of a serenade leading to a fight, and his unexpected participation in a bullfight.

sub_scenes.title: Arrival in Spain and Serenade Misunderstanding
sub_scenes.description: The time traveler arrives in Spain and misinterprets a serenade as harassment.

sub_scenes.title: Unintentional Bullfight Heroism
sub_scenes.description: The fight leads to the time traveler unexpectedly participating in and winning a bullfight.

Major_Arcs.title: Oop's Spanish Adventure and Romantic Mishaps
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts Oop's time travel to Spain for information, his romantic encounter there, and the jealous repercussions upon his return.

sub_scenes.title: Anticipation and Return of Oop
sub_scenes.description: Characters wait for Oop's return and the information he gathered in Spain.

narrative_arcs.title: Anticipation for Oop's Return and Information
The Promised Kiss and Romantic Interlude
Questioning Oop's Learnings and Rejection of Kiss

Major_Arcs.title: King for a Day - A Harsh Lesson in Kingship
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores the concept of 'King for a Day', revealing the unexpected hardships and public rejection associated with even temporary rule.

sub_scenes.title: Inauguration of Temporary King
sub_scenes.description: A temporary king is appointed and initially celebrated.

narrative_arcs.title: The Inauguration of a Temporary King
Debate on the Ease of Kingship
King's Challenge and Temporary Replacement Plan
The Crowning of the New Temporary King
Proclamation of a Temporary King and His Expectations

sub_scenes.title: Rejection and Harsh Reality of Temporary Rule
sub_scenes.description: The temporary king faces immediate rejection and violence from the crowd, leading to his disillusionment and the original king's return.

narrative_arcs.title: Rejection and Attack on the Temporary King
Seeking Refuge and Realization of Hardships
Return of the Original King and Enjoyment of Power

Major_Arcs.title: Guz's Unpleasant Day of Relaxation and Forced Bath
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts Guz's attempt at relaxation being constantly interrupted and escalating into physical confrontation and a forced bath.

sub_scenes.title: Relaxation Interrupted and Disapproval
sub_scenes.description: Guz is relaxing when a woman interrupts and expresses strong disapproval.

Major_Arcs.title: Clam Dispute and Wise Man's Bizarre Justice
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc portrays a clam dispute that escalates into a fight and is resolved by a 'wise man' through confiscation.

sub_scenes.title: Outbreak of Clam Dispute and Fight
sub_scenes.description: A clam dispute erupts into accusations and a physical fight.

narrative_arcs.title: Explanation of the Clam Dispute and Seeking Wisdom
The Wise Man's Solution: Confiscation and Peace

Major_Arcs.title: King's Erratic Behavior and Violent Reaction
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc showcases the king's unpredictable behavior, from tolerating violence to sudden shifts in mood during dinner, culminating in a violent outburst.

sub_scenes.title: King's Tolerance of Violence and Accusation Against Wise Man
sub_scenes.description: The king's court is depicted as tolerating violence, and the 'wise man' is accused of financial misdeeds.

narrative_arcs.title: Investigating the Racket and Ongoing Beating

sub_scenes.title: King's Dinner and Violent Outburst
sub_scenes.description: The king's dinner starts pleasantly but quickly turns sour with a violent reaction to a playful gesture.

narrative_arcs.title: The Ulcer Inquiry and Bizarre Demand

Major_Arcs.title: Apology, Freedom from Rule, and New Leadership
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts reconciliation after violence, followed by a character's relief at leaving a position of power and a new leadership offer.

sub_scenes.title: Misunderstanding, Apology, and Reconciliation
sub_scenes.description: Violence is followed by apology and reconciliation between two cavemen.

narrative_arcs.title: Measuring for Rule and Strange Duck

Major_Arcs.title: Fortune Telling, Romantic Prophecy, and Barberous Abduction
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc starts with fortune telling and a romantic prophecy but quickly takes a dark turn into abduction for barbering services.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Fortune Telling
sub_scenes.description: Fortune telling predicts a romantic encounter.

Major_Arcs.title: Time Machine Malfunction - Roman Centurion in the Lab
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes the narrative with a time machine experiment going wrong, resulting in the unexpected arrival of a Roman centurion.

sub_scenes.title: Time Machine Setup and Unexpected Arrival
sub_scenes.description: A time machine experiment intended to bring someone from the past goes wrong, materializing a Roman centurion instead.
